abstract: these prince harry and meghan markle dolls are the stuff of nightmares .
article: with the royal wedding in just a few months commemorative royal couple memorabilia is flooding etsy . among the plates , mugs and posters , you can get an especially unique keepsake : harry and meghan dolls . if only they looked like the actual harry and meghan . with his sgt. pepper-esque bowl cut , the `` harry '' doll looks nothing like the actual prince harry . where 's his famous ginger hair ? the stubble ? the bright blue eyes ? other than the dark hair , mini meghan shares little with her namesake . the doll 's sharply plucked brows and vacant eyes have been scaring twitter .

at least harry comes with two outfits . these `` harry '' and `` meghan '' dolls really are off their clackers . pic . twitter . com/tjbjcggzyp -- eamonn forde january 18 , 2018twitter was n't too kind on the new dolls . let me list the things that are wrong with these new ` harry & meghan ' dolls . 1 . everything . pic . twitter . com/hjtrrqztqs -- michael moran january 18 , 2018for only $ 181 you can purchase the ` harry & meghan wedding dolls ' ... that will probably murder you in your sleep .

- @blakesshow with @peterkash #royalwedding #nope pic . twitter . com/yzj82bjrpn -- 93-5 the move january 18 , 2018i think the harry doll has borrowed lord farquad 's hair pic . twitter . com/qsapawtvxl -- dan farmer ü§ì üè¥Û†ÅßÛ†Å¢Û†Å∑Û†Å¨Û†Å≥Û†Åø january 17 , 2018new jersey based artist shirlee corsey sells these dolls on etsy . her shop , historywearz , features historical doll costumes , including handmade hamilton-inspired revolutionary war outfits and disney princess ball gowns . at just $ 175 for both harry and meghan , these dolls are a steal .
